title: Cataphract
name: Nyriad
summary: The Cataphract is a formidable mounted warrior from the Levantine Sultanate, bonded with the spirit of her horse, Kargadaan, whose skull she always carries around. In battle, it transforms into a spectral steed of blue flames to assist the Cataphract. Together they form an unstoppable cavalry unit, using their combined skills to charge into battle and vanquish foes.
history: Once a respected warrior of the Levantine Sultanate, the Cataphract's life changed when her beloved Kargadaan was fatally wounded. Desperate, she stole a powerful artifact to revive him, resulting in their exile. Now the spirit of the horse speaks to her, and they fight together against the horrors of the estate.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Angular facial structure and prominent cheekbones

notes: Regularly converses with Kargadaan's skull, though no one else can hear it
Speaks with a mild Levantine accent, which becomes more pronounced when excited or angry
Maintains rigid military discipline, and is disappointed when she finds others' lacking
Under extreme stress, her identity fractures as she begins speaking and acting as though she were Kargadaan
Forms immediate judgments of others and stubbornly sticks to them
